github:v2fly_v2ray-core_v5_app_browserfo.description: Config is the settings for BrowserForwarder.

proxiedDomain.description:
ProxiedDomain indicates the mapped domain has the same IP address on this
domain. V2Ray will use this domain for IP queries.

nameServer.description: NameServer list used by this DNS client.

clientIp.description:
Client IP for EDNS client subnet. Must be 4 bytes (IPv4) or 16 bytes
(IPv6).

tag.description: Tag is the inbound tag of DNS client.

subjectSelector.description: @Document The selectors for outbound under observation
@Document The selectors for outbound under observation

destination.description:
destination url, need 204 for success return
default http://www.google.com/gen_204

interval.description: health check interval, int64 values of time.Duration

samplingCount.description: sampling count is the amount of recent ping results which are kept for calculation

timeout.description: ping timeout, int64 values of time.Duration

connection.description: Buffer size per connection, in bytes. -1 for unlimited buffer.

github:v2fly_v2ray-core_v5_app_policy:Po.description: Timeout is a message for timeout settings in various stages, in seconds.

domain.description: List of domains for target domain matching.

geoip.description:
List of GeoIPs for target IP address matching. If this entry exists, the
cidr above will have no effect. GeoIP fields with the same country code are
supposed to contain exactly same content. They will be merged during
runtime. For customized GeoIPs, please leave country code empty.

sourceGeoip.description:
List of GeoIPs for source IP address matching. If this entry exists, the
source_cidr above will have no effect.

sourcePortList.description: List of ports for source port matching.

geoDomain.description: geo_domain instruct simplified config loader to load geo domain rule and fill in domain field.

baselines.description: RTT baselines for selecting, int64 values of time.Duration

maxRtt.description: max acceptable rtt, filter away high delay nodes. defalut 0

ip.description: IP address, should be either 4 or 16 bytes.

prefix.description: Number of leading ones in the network mask.

github:v2fly_v2ray-core_v5_app_router_ro.description: IP for routing decision, in CIDR form.

attribute.description: Attributes of this domain. May be used for filtering.

resourceHash.description: resource_hash instruct simplified config converter to load domain from geo file.
resource_hash instruct simplified config converter to load domain from geo file.

allowInsecure.description: Whether or not to allow self-signed certificates.

certificate.description: List of certificates to be served on server.

nextProtocol.description: Lists of string as ALPN values.

enableSessionResumption.description: Whether or not to enable session (ticket) resumption.

disableSystemRoot.description:
If true, root certificates on the system will not be loaded for
verification.

verifyClientCertificate.description: If true, the client is required to present a certificate.

path.description: URL path to the WebSocket service. Empty value means root(/).

title: JSON schema for V2Ray jsonv5 configuration
description: JSON schema for V2Ray jsonv5 configuration format: https://github.com/v2fly/v2ray-core
